image.title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS3.0.12.0.WPACNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 17 Ultra China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 17 Ultra China

Codename: nezha

Version: OS3.0.12.0.WPACNXM | 16.0

Size: 12.6 GB

MD5: fb06c237472aca0dad570c11e3755e9d

Changelog:
[System]
Fix: Zenless Zone Zero couldn't be controlled or crashed in some cases
Fix: Turning Satellite communications on or off made mobile data unusable in some cases
Fix: Compatibility issues for some SIM cards
Fix: 50W in-vehicle wireless charger stopped charging unexpectedly in some cases
Fix: Bluetooth connection was interrupted in some cases
[Camera]
Optimization: Taking dynamic shots of fireworks
Fix: Image capture didn't always work properly in some cases

Download: Here
